name: Tabbed Interface
description: Interactive tabbed content interface with responsive mobile support. Great for organizing content into sections.
content:
<script>
(function() {
  var container = document.querySelector('{{SELECTOR}}');
  if (!container) return;
  
  var tabs = [
    { id: 'tab1', label: '{{TAB_1_LABEL}}', content: '{{TAB_1_CONTENT}}' },
    { id: 'tab2', label: '{{TAB_2_LABEL}}', content: '{{TAB_2_CONTENT}}' },
    { id: 'tab3', label: '{{TAB_3_LABEL}}', content: '{{TAB_3_CONTENT}}' }
  ];
  
  // Remove empty tabs
  tabs = tabs.filter(function(tab) { return tab.label !== ''; });
  
  // Inject CSS
  var style = document.createElement('style');
  style.textContent = '' +
    '.at-tabs { width: 100%; }' +
    '.at-tabs-nav { display: flex; border-bottom: 2px solid #dee2e6; margin-bottom: 20px; gap: 5px; }' +
    '.at-tab-button { background: transparent; border: none; padding: 12px 24px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 500; color: #6c757d; border-bottom: 3px solid transparent; transition: all 0.3s ease; }' +
    '.at-tab-button:hover { color: #495057; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.02); }' +
    '.at-tab-button.active { color: {{ACTIVE_COLOR}}; border-bottom-color: {{ACTIVE_COLOR}}; }' +
    '.at-tab-content { display: none; padding: 20px 0; animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease; }' +
    '.at-tab-content.active { display: block; }' +
    '@keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } }' +
    '@media (max-width: 768px) {' +
    '  .at-tabs-nav { flex-direction: column; border-bottom: none; }' +
    '  .at-tab-button { text-align: left; padding: 12px 16px; border-bottom: 1px solid #dee2e6; border-left: 3px solid transparent; }' +
    '  .at-tab-button.active { border-bottom-color: #dee2e6; border-left-color: {{ACTIVE_COLOR}}; }' +
    '}';
  document.head.appendChild(style);
  
  // Build tabs HTML
  container.className = 'at-tabs';
  container.innerHTML = '';
  
  var nav = document.createElement('div');
  nav.className = 'at-tabs-nav';
  
  var contentContainer = document.createElement('div');
  
  // Create tab buttons and content
  for (var i = 0; i < tabs.length; i++) {
    var tab = tabs[i];
    
    // Create button
    var button = document.createElement('button');
    button.className = 'at-tab-button' + (i === 0 ? ' active' : '');
    button.textContent = tab.label;
    button.setAttribute('data-tab', tab.id);
    button.setAttribute('role', 'tab');
    button.setAttribute('aria-selected', i === 0 ? 'true' : 'false');
    nav.appendChild(button);
    
    // Create content
    var content = document.createElement('div');
    content.className = 'at-tab-content' + (i === 0 ? ' active' : '');
    content.id = tab.id;
    content.setAttribute('role', 'tabpanel');
    content.innerHTML = tab.content;
    contentContainer.appendChild(content);
  }
  
  container.appendChild(nav);
  container.appendChild(contentContainer);
  
  // Add click handlers
  var buttons = nav.querySelectorAll('.at-tab-button');
  for (var j = 0; j < buttons.length; j++) {
    buttons[j].addEventListener('click', function() {
      var targetId = this.getAttribute('data-tab');
      
      // Deactivate all
      var allButtons = nav.querySelectorAll('.at-tab-button');
      var allContents = contentContainer.querySelectorAll('.at-tab-content');
      for (var k = 0; k < allButtons.length; k++) {
        allButtons[k].classList.remove('active');
        allButtons[k].setAttribute('aria-selected', 'false');
      }
      for (var l = 0; l < allContents.length; l++) {
        allContents[l].classList.remove('active');
      }
      
      // Activate target
      this.classList.add('active');
      this.setAttribute('aria-selected', 'true');
      document.getElementById(targetId).classList.add('active');
    });
  }
})();
</script>

variables.name: {{TAB_3_LABEL}}
variables.description: Third tab label (leave empty if only 2 tabs needed)

notes: This template creates 2-3 tabs. For more tabs, duplicate the tab variables pattern in the template.
